Pillar of Power.name: Pillar of Power
Pillar of Power.flavor: You call up a pillar of fire that rises from the bowels of the Nine Hells and incinerates your foe.
Pillar of Power.onHit: 2d8 + Constitution modifier fire damage. Each creature adjacent to the target takes fire damage equal to half the damage dealt.

Gates of Hell.name: Gates of Hell
Gates of Hell.flavor: You open a gate through Hell to connect points on the battlefield. Your allies can pass through it unharmed, but your foes cannot.
Gates of Hell.effect: You create a dimensional rift between the two target squares that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that enters one of the target squares can move to the other target square as if it were adjacent to that square. A creature cannot pass through the rift if either square is occupied by another creature. Each enemy that moves from one gate square to the other takes 1d10 + your Constitution modifier fire damage.

Unleash the Inferno.name: Unleash the Inferno
Unleash the Inferno.flavor: You call up an earth-shaking column of fire, which burns and knocks down your foes.
Unleash the Inferno.onHit: 2d10 + Constitution modifier fire damage, and you knock the target prone.
